title: Projects
subtitle: These are some of the projects I have worked on. Each one has been an opportunity to learn new technologies and skills, and to apply them in creating innovative solutions.

projectsList.title: Piranha Planner - Landing Page
projectsList.description: A responsive and modern landing page built with React and Vite to present the core features of Piranha Planner.

projectsList.title: Piranha Planner
projectsList.description: A collaborative task manager built with React and Supabase. It supports user authentication, task sharing, comments, file uploads, messaging, notifications, and productivity stats.

projectsList.title: Medical Appointment Management
projectsList.description: Planned web application aimed at efficiently managing medical appointments. It will feature authentication and role-based access (administrator, doctor, patient), consultation scheduling, medical history tracking, notifications, and custom dashboards per user type. The frontend will be built with React and the backend with Spring Boot, following fullstack best practices with a focus on security, usability, and scalability.
